title.rendered: Scott Disick & Christine Burke: Already Living Together?!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

It’s been two months since we first learned that Scott Disick is dating Christine Burke, and it seems the couple is moving much, much faster than anyone expected.

In fact, OK! magazine is reporting today that Scott and Christine are already living together.

Sources say the 20-year-old hasn’t officially moved in with Scott, but she’s more or less taken up residence in what we assume is a liquor bottle-festooned bro palace.

"Christine has basically moved into Scott’s house,” says one insider.

“She only ever goes to her home to pick up clothes. She spends a lot of time sleeping in and wearing Scott’s pajamas and sweatpants…She hasn’t slept at home once.”

Naturally, there’s been some serious partying going on, as despite six stints in rehab, Scott is still boozing.

Unfortunately, his new lady and her friends are not of legal drinking age. In fact, some of them can’t even vote yet:

"She has her friends over to party and hang out in the Jacuzzi and some of them are only 17,” the source says. “Having Christine at his house has in no way slowed Scott’s partying.”

Yes, just when you thought Scott Disick couldn’t sink any lower, he started drinking with high school kids.

There’s no rock bottom the Lord can’t hit!

Christine Burke: Photos of Scott Disick’s Kendall Jenner Lookalike!

VIEW GALLERY
